title: Ontology Version
description: An ontology version of an ontology

iri.description: The unique identifier for an ontology version

number.description: The version number of the version of the ontology

evaluation_state.description: The evaluation state of this ontology version

commit_oid.description: The commit oid of the commit that triggered this ontology version

basepath.description: The path to the ontology relative to the git repositories root directory

file_extension.description: Actual file extension of the ontology file in the repository
